title: Game Progress Route
content:
There, encounter Karlach, the devil needing pursuit, as forewarned by Paladins. This updates the "Hunt the Devil" quest. Speak to Karlach and choose from these options:

Are you all right? Devil! Face Me! Try to Douse the flames. She looks dangerous - watch her carefully These are no natural flames - prepare to fight. I know you - you're the monster the blade of frontiers is hunting.

Opt for the first choice, and she confirms her well-being. Karlach recognizes you, asking about the Paladins. In
